website_summaries.verdict: Although not completely noiseless, this wheel is still quieter than most others in its class.
pros: Made with ball bearings for a smoother, quieter run
Running surface is solid and safe for sensitive feet and trailing tails
Can be used as a freestanding wheel or mounted to a cage wall
cons: It isn't as quiet as it claims to be

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hedgehogs
customer_reviews.text: We have a hedgehog and the Silent Spinner is literally the best. The bottom stand detaches and you can screw the wheel to a wire cage with ease. I can only hear when Reggie is running if he drops a piece of food on it, since it clinks repeatedly while he spins. The pieces detach from one another, which makes cleaning so much easier. I'd say this wheel is great for a multitude of pets, but its especially great for hedgehogs since their little legs are too fragile for other wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up, fell apart.
customer_reviews.text: This wheel was fine for the time it held up. My 3 rats loved it and it was a decent bit quieter than other wheels I’ve had. However, it broke after 6 months. The back portion detached from the wheel one day and the little plastic piece that holds the front fell off. It wouldn’t reattach/screw on so I got a nut to fit the screw holding the wheel and something behind it is stripped and won’t hold it steady. So the wheel is useless now and I need to buy another one. Overall decent quality but I’ve had other wheels last years vs. only 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Not good for hedgehogs!!!
customer_reviews.text: This wheel comes in two pieces, a front and back half. When clicked together there is a small crease between the two pieces. For most animals I doubt this would be an issue. But it almost severely injured our hedgehog when on the very first day it got its tiny toe stuck in the crease. Thank goodness we were there to witness it and to get it unstuck. Had this occurred in the middle of the night when hedgehogs usually run our little hedgy would probably be missing a toe. If you do have a hedgehog, get the non-silent version of this wheel that is molded from a single piece.
customer_reviews.author: Eggdog

customer_reviews.title: do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Received May 8th and they did not even last 1 month! Every time chinchillas ran on them, they broke apart! Even had 1 chinchilla hurt its foot on the broken plastic! Seller will not take back or replace and it has only been 4 weeks of non-use! 20.00 down the drain! Bought 3! $60.00 down the drain! Junk, do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: This wheel was a dud
customer_reviews.text: The day I received this wheel, I should've returned it. Immediately upon arrival it wasn't spinning right. I oiled it and it fixed the problem for about a month. After that it stopped spinning completely, so I started having to oil it once a week. Now months later I have to oil it every other day for it to spin at all. I have bought several Kaytee Silent Spinner Wheels in the past and never had this problem. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: toni merrell

customer_reviews.title: Spinner broke after 6 mo
customer_reviews.text: We purchased for our hedgehog. It was a good size, and cute in his cage, but he did have a bit of trouble getting into and out of it because of the rounded lip. We don't recommend for this type of animal, as it poops while it runs, and the wheel is great at "keeping" it. It required cleaning every other day minimum. Not only that, but the wheel broke one day. Luckily, while my teenaged daughter was handling it and not while the hedgehog was running on it. We proceeded to purchase another wheel (that is flat) and not only does the poop fly off, but the hedgehog prefers it- he runs on it for hours.
customer_reviews.author: CarrieM

customer_reviews.title: Not good for larger chinchillas
customer_reviews.text: When my chinchillas were still babies, this wheel worked well for them, so long as the bottom stand was weighted down with granite blocks to keep it from tipping. It is noisy, so I do not know why it is called silent. It can be heard from rooms away. But noise aside, this wheel is not sturdy enough for larger chinchillas. Mine are just over 1 year now, and this wheel simply is not rugged enough to handle them.
customer_reviews.author: Regina E.

customer_reviews.title: Wheel seperates in half after a while
customer_reviews.text: The wheel separates in half after a few months making it hard to clean and hard for the animals to use. It does not snap on or off very easily. I have had wheels in the past that were the same brand and they never separated. I would like it better if the wheel was just one continuous piece instead of two. The wheel itself is very sturdy works great and is pretty quiet except when it separates. I have tried super glue and tape and it still comes back apart after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: peachy

customer_reviews.title: and the snap-together feature makes cleaning it very easy. We've had our for almost a year
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog loves this wheel. He actually fits in it and because its rounded he doesn't fall off sometimes (he's clumsy and did with his other wheel) It is quiet, and the snap-together feature makes cleaning it very easy. We've had our for almost a year, when it gets squeaky we out a little vegetable oil on it and its good for another few months of his fat butt running on it for hours every night !
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Burling

customer_reviews.title: believe the videos!  poor quality item.
customer_reviews.text: I sent it back the same day. Absolute garbage. Believe the videos about the change in quality. No matter how hard I tried, the wheel would not even make a full rotation on its own. I didn't even put it in my hedgie's cage. I returned it and bought a different brand for half the price... That actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Over the top customer support...
customer_reviews.text: So let's say that I have a problem with the item but it is nothing to do with the item the item is great my animal in the other hand knows how to take this apart and has eaten the parts off the bearing. So I called today asking to buy replacement parts and was told that they would send me out the parts needed at no cost.... I am More then happy with the item, with the quality of the item and at the customer support from this company. Yes the item is not cheap but you are getting what you payed for and way more. I would buy this item again and others from this company...
customer_reviews.author: BCF1

customer_reviews.title: My baby opossums love it!
customer_reviews.text: Yea, thought that title would get a click! I work for a wildlife hospital and I raise orphaned opossums. They love it! I love the closed wheel, I’m not worried about anyone getting their tail tangled. I still keep an eye on them when they are on it but I feel safer with them on this one rather than an open cage design.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Every chinchilla wants this wheel!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I am astonished at some reviews on here. My one year old male chinchilla has been using this daily, for about 2 weeks. It is anchored to the cage wall, which could affect the stability. It seems the product works best when attached to the cage like this. I also lined the inside of the wheel with duct tape to make it easier to wipe out and also prevent any nail/limb injuries. Well made and no issues with chinch chewing on it. (But his habitat is about 3.5 feet by 6 feet and he has many fun chews and distractions...)
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I like the wheel, but I don't like the spinning assembly on the back of it. It hangs up on itself sometimes and doesn't spin smoothly. I'd pass on this larger wheel if you're shopping for a syrian hamster. I think it'll be fine for larger animals like rats and chinchillas though.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hedgehog
customer_reviews.text: Our hedgie loves this! Easy to clean and very quiet. We do have to clean it every day because GrumpyButt poops on the run, but we just unscrew the inner cap and remove the wheel from the stand - easy peasey. Since he uses it so much, it started getting a bit squeaky, but if you locate the two little blue rubber wheels on the stand that bump up against the wheel, just put a few drops of mineral oil on your fingers and rub it into the rubber wheels and voila - no more squeak.
customer_reviews.author: Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Great For Rats
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my female rats and it's my favorite wheel so far. It's not silent but I think that is from the bouncing of my rats running on it and the wheels on the back, then again: no wheel is silent. Easy to clean, I just stick it in my sink with warm soapy water and scrub. I attach the wheel to the side of my cage so I cannot review the stand part of the wheel. I'm sure they'll eventually destroy some part of this wheel, but it's definitely more sturdy and safe than any others I have purchased so I'm sure it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: William Horn

customer_reviews.title: My rats love this spinner!
customer_reviews.text: Took a while but my rats are finally using this wheel frequently, sometimes both rats at the same time. It's hilarious when they try to go in opposite directions! Came within promised delivery time. Easy to assemble. The only problem I have had is that the yellow plastic nut which tightens the spinner to the cage loosens up after being used a while and the whole spinner falls off the bolt. Scared me when it happened. If it would have fallen on one of the rats, it could have seriously hurt them.
customer_reviews.author: patsygb

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware JUNK wheel
customer_reviews.text: This wheel is JUNK, absolute waste of you money. Parts fall off such as the black piece that you screw to brace the wheel onto the cage, the middle piece inside the wheel that houses the screw comes off. Had to super glue those 2 parts with Gorilla Glue. And omg silent my butt, it's loud as heck. Not happy with this product at all, TOTAL junk. I wouldn't give it any stars but not an option.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: But after seeing her in it I now it's fine plenty of room shegets it going
customer_reviews.text: This 12 inch wheel is huge! At first I was afraid I went to big for my syrian hamster. But after seeing her in it I now it's fine plenty of room shegets it going... So much so I had to use some plate weights to weigh it down so it didn't band the glass bottom or the top. Skittles loves it! And no arching back for her makes me happy and glad I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Good but breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: It is a decent wheel, but breaks VERY easily. We have chinchillas and they break it fairly easily, the white part and the colored part connect and break very easily, so it has to be super glued together to protect your pets little feetsies or they could get hurt, not to mention the fact that if it breaks you have to get a new one. I've been through three of them, my chinchillas LOVE IT but because they run on it so often and aren't exactly small it does break very easily.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Large enough for full grown hedgehog
customer_reviews.text: I inherited a hedgehog who had a 6 inch wheel. I knew by looking at him it was too small for him to even use comfortably. I ordered this 12 inch wheel and it is the perfect size for him and even though I haven't seen him use it yet, I am certain he has been as there is bedding and waste to be cleaned off it every morning. I priced these at the big box pet stores and they were twice the price for this same brand.
customer_reviews.author: mlph

customer_reviews.title: Great wheel, stand doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: The wheel itself looks great! Easy installation to the cage wall, spins without catching, no sounds, thick sturdy plastic, very spacious. However, the metal stand doesn't actually fit into the holes on the wheel, at least on mine, meaning I had to attach it to the wire rather than leaving it freestanding. Since I was planning on using the stand, I knocked off two stars, but if you intend to hook it to the wall, this is a five star wheel for rats/chinchillas/maybe even a particularly large hamster.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: My Syrian hamster didn't seem to like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I only used this for a night before returning it. My Syrian hamster didn't seem to like it very much, and preferred the flying-disc type runner that we'd bought when we first adopted him. He couldn't gain much momentum, and while the size was good for him, the bearings didn't run very smoothly and it seemed a little heavy. The wheel was also prone to tipping, and we had to put a weight on the stand to keep it upright. We'd sort of buried the stand in his bedding at first hoping that would be enough to keep it secure, but it wasn't. We ended up opting for a Wodent Wheel in the end!
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Chrysler

customer_reviews.title: Not made for chinchillas
customer_reviews.text: Lots of issues. 1) It's not sturdy no matter what I do. It's wobbles and the whole cage shakes when he runs. I even tried my own modifications, same results. 2) It's too small for my BABY chinchilla. 3) It's definitely not silent, it makes an ear piercing squeak when my chin gets going fast. I was hoping it would last me a few months, but he needs something more dependable.
customer_reviews.author: rita osebold

customer_reviews.title: My chinchilla LOVES this wheel but...
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla LOVES this wheel. The problem I’ve had is that the screw comes off every couple of days if I don’t tighten every night. I used a little plumbers tape and that helped for a few days but he runs so fast and so much the wheel just falls off if I don’t tighten nightly now! So my chin LOVES this wheel but it’s a daily chore for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Baker

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly silent...
customer_reviews.text: This isn't metal against metal loud, but it's not entirely silent either. My buddies don't bother me while I'm sleeping with their noise, but it can be rough when falling asleep. Also, when cleaning, make sure it's completely dry before putting it back or it's SO NOISY. Great otherwise and my guys won't be outgrowing it.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: like chinchillas and guinea pigs
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my hampster without measuring 12 inches. It's definitely made for much bigger rodents, like chinchillas and guinea pigs. I wish there were a size between this and the 6 inch because the 6in is a little to small. These are great wheels however. Completely silent and I like that you can use the stand or mount it on the cage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon useelr

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately- we didn’t have this for a very long time. At first it was good. Fairly quiet. Then it got very loud. I ensured it was hooked up correctly- it was. It ended up Breaking. Bummer. Our chinchilla liked it.
customer_reviews.author: mastack

customer_reviews.title: 12 inch is quite big, so make sure you have the right cage.
customer_reviews.text: It's 2:30am and I am observing how the silent spinner is working with my son's hamster in full gallop. So far it is whirring silently as promised. The only thing I can hear is it's tiny claws hitting the plastic. With the old one I can hear it all the way from outside the window clanking away. My estimate is this is between 80 to 90% quieter than a regular wheel. Good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenspur

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price. Works best for small adults and babies.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these wheels and on two of them the yellow cone shaped bolt on the inside front of the wheel came off and the wheel fell off. So I super glued the little yellow bolt and screwed it back on. So far they're holding up. Hopefully they won't come off again. This wheel is good for smaller chinchillas and babies. I wouldn't use it for larger adults because it's too small (12") and their weight would probably break it.
customer_reviews.author: Elene

customer_reviews.title: Giant is bigger then I expected
customer_reviews.text: The giant size is almost too big for my 3 month old degus. Also, this definitely isn't silent. I have the smaller sizes and those are silent, but the giant one has a different configuration. I even applied oil but it's still not silent. Also, I highly recommend applying tape over the gaps between the assembled wheel. It seems dangerous to just leave those. I'm not sure why this manufacturer hasn't fixed that yet..
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This has to be "peak exercise wheel". The price didn't excite me but now I think it was worth it. It's dead silent, it's large, it mounted to the side of the cage easily and my critters seem to love it.
customer_reviews.author: leenyx

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality and Dangerous For Pet
customer_reviews.text: The knob that holds the wheel in place comes off daily. One time I woke up to find my chinchilla stuck beneath the wheel. Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: My Chinchilla Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My adult chinchilla loves it, usually at 3 a.m. I give it four stars because 1. the last one lasted about 3 years and then broke, and 2) I wish it weren't all plastic (bad for the animals advertised for).
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Quiet as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Only one of our rats has figured out how to use this so far. It is Monroe's favorite toy and thankfully it is whisper quiet because she can spend a lot of time on it. Of course, she's our active rattie who does not need to slim down. Hopefully our chubby ladies will learn from her. We were so happy to find a wheel that was not made from mesh. This wheel does not damage Monroe's delicate feet.
customer_reviews.author: SAinVATop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: but I had him on an open space in a bathroom so it was all good. The other thing is that is a little ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my hedgehog. He had a blast using the spinner and it is indeed very quiet and steady. I did make a mistake on the size. This would not fit most cages, but I had him on an open space in a bathroom so it was all good. The other thing is that is a little bit hard to clean because it leaks the water when you leave it soaking, but again, minor detail.
customer_reviews.author: J. Zomer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't stay silent long
customer_reviews.text: They call it "silent", but mine has become very squeaky as of late (and I haven't owned it all that long, nor has it been exposed to water or anything... or even greatly used by my chinchilla). I had to put a little lubricant on it, which was mildly disappointing given the name.
customer_reviews.author: Seemann

customer_reviews.title: If Grumpy loves it, I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this, but more importantly Grumpy loves it. I hear him running hard when the lights go out. Since I said heard, clearly it is not silent, yet I still gave it 4 stars because it isn't loud. It is super easy to clean, easy to assemble, take apart and reassemble.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Screw seems faulty on this product.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for a little over 2 months now...my chinchilla is not fully grown, however the wheel couldn't seem to hold its weight. So, the little screw fell off (as other reviews state) and now the wheel is useless. I would suggest that if you're going to buy the product (which has a nice looking design and is pretty quiet), just make sure you crazy glue the small yellow nut or it'll fall apart very rapidly.
customer_reviews.author: Karla & Buds

customer_reviews.title: Hedgie recommended
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my hedgehog. It’s easy to clean and is relatively silent. The quietest wheel I’ve found anyway. My hedgehog does run a lot every night so I have to replace his wheel about once a year or so because it eventually gets worn out and squeaky but I feel like a year of heavy use is worth the price. Cheaper here than the local pet store too.
customer_reviews.author: Tarah

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous, don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This wheel is dangerous. After my chinchilla ran in it for a few minutes, the center knob other reviewers mentioned fell off. I tightened it, same thing. This could cause the wheel to fall off smashing or trapping the pet. There are also many rough edges where the white and purple plastic meet, another dangerous issue with this wheel.
customer_reviews.author: J. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe for Sugar Gliders!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy this brand or type of wheel again. When I first put it in my sugar gliders cage, I thought he was just getting use to it because it was new and did not have his scent. That was around midnight, fast forward about two hrs and I am awaken by a loud bang. The wheel had not fallen but he was running on it and was slung out of the wheel and hit the wall of the cage very hard. Luckily, he was not injured but visibly you could tell he was very distressed by it. Needless to say the wheel came out immediately and went into the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Foster

customer_reviews.title: This wheel is the perfect size for my hedgehog
customer_reviews.text: This wheel is the perfect size for my hedgehog. It's as quiet as it can be and it rarely disturbs my sleep. (Mind you, that my hedgehog is in the same room as me.) If your pet's cage/wheel is placed in a different room, it shouldn't give you any trouble. Either ways, I highly recommend this product especially for hedgie owners.
customer_reviews.author: SweetDreamsXoXo

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use this wheel for a hedgehog. Other wheels I’ve had were very loud. This one is completely silent. Doesn’t wobble in the cage, and doesn’t make any sound turning. Plastic surface cleans up easy. Worth the money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: This wheel is actually quiet. I can barely hear it. You have the option of attaching it to the cage bars or using the stand that comes with it. My only problem is that it was too big to fit through the cage door of my rat manor cage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: well i wouldn't say silent
customer_reviews.text: Great that you can use on the provided stand or attach directly to the cage. If you have a beast that loves to run, I'd suggest attaching to the cage for support.
customer_reviews.author: droidlover

customer_reviews.title: Too hard for my hamster to turn. From what ...
customer_reviews.text: Too hard for my hamster to turn. From what I have read, a common problem with this wheel. No way to loosen the wheel for easier spinning.
customer_reviews.author: Scttygrrl

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes not silent spinner wheel.
customer_reviews.text: Using this for a hedgehog and she absolutely loves it and so do I. So why 4 stars? Well there are two small problems, 1. It is not completely silent unfortunately, when she really gets going it starts making a noise. 2. If you don't clean extremely often you can run into the issue of having to soak it to clean. This isn't so bad considering the parts separate but it is less work than scrubbing it.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a week
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla loved it... for a week. Then it split in two and just falls apart. Both Chilly and I are very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this wheel,  what a difference.
customer_reviews.text: I am one happy Chinchilla Mom and Dumbo is happy too. I tried the other wheel first, it was so loud everyone in the house knew Dumbo was on the wheel. I bought the silent spinner and what a difference. Dumbo gets his exercise and we have peace. Save time and money and just buy this wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Quieter than other Wheels
customer_reviews.text: I've used these wheels for years. My rats have all loved them, even if some of them thought it was an interestingly shaped bed. It's not silent but it's certainly quieter than any other wheel I've tried out. Really my biggest complaint with the wheel is that I can't choose the color when I'm ordering through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Our chinchilla LOVES this!! Uses it constantly! It is loud, but super funny because she seems to spin more when we're either trying to talk, or sleep. Definitely recommend. Gives them good exercise. (Sometimes sleeps in it.)
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rubbe

customer_reviews.title: It really is silent!
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog loves his wheel so much that he practically spends his nightime in there! It does exactly as described and truly quiet. You thank yourself for buying this wheel! A definite 👍🏻👍🏻 Up.
customer_reviews.author: Little Bird

customer_reviews.title: but the second one is holding up nicely. Our rats love it
customer_reviews.text: The fist one we bought came apart, but the second one is holding up nicely. Our rats love it. I gave it four stars because even though the first one did come apart and could not be put back together, we did not buy it from this vendor even though it was a Kaytee brand wheel. The one we ordered from this vendor came very quickly and we've been happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Southern-Wolfsong

customer_reviews.title: The first one of these I Bought was great but didn't last very long
customer_reviews.text: The first one of these I Bought was great but didn't last very long. The yellow piece that spins and attaches the wheel to the cage word out. The second one I bought doesn't stay clipped together, the front and back pieces of the wheel. I'm afraid my hedgehog will get his foot stuck in it!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica H

customer_reviews.title: good for hamster
customer_reviews.text: OK, I bought this for my huge hamster thinking it would fit in his cage, but it didn't. He does however, like to be taken out of his cage and using it once in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Julinoe

customer_reviews.title: The girls love it, i like it
customer_reviews.text: Nice sized wheel that isnt too expensive. Ive only just received it and put it in with my 3 female rats. So far the bigger one is hogging the wheel but it seems like they love it. For ppl wondering about how loud it is, it does shake a little. We mounted ours on the side of the cage. It isnt the high pitched squeak of a metal wheel, but its not quiet. Light sleepers will have an issue with this wheel. I do like the open face design. The wodent wheels were a pain to clean. I would purchase another one. Mine came in purple.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cole

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well, bought about two months ago and ...
customer_reviews.text: Holding up well, bought about two months ago and no squeak. It does make a grinding noise, but that's to be expected. Nothing is silent. The only issue I had was the wheel wobbling after about a month, the pieces just needed to be retightened.
customer_reviews.author: creed02

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This is kinda unstable and very difficult to clean. You can’t just wipe it clean, we have to soak it in the bathtub with some dawn dish soap and clean it with a brush. And it’s not silent. I knew to expect some noise because nothing can be truest silent but this isn’t even close
customer_reviews.author: Liz Bell

customer_reviews.title: Silent, appropirately sized and perfect for a hedgehog
customer_reviews.text: Works well, my hedgehog loves to run in it at night. It's completely silent as we do not hear her running along throughout the night. It's a good size for her and it can mount to the cage or remain free standing. My major concern is the surface is difficult to clean. It'd be nice if the surface was a bit smoother and non stick. Cleaning the wheel requires a bit of effort.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie C.

customer_reviews.title: We couldn't find the giant ones in our local stores so we are really happy to have found it here
customer_reviews.text: This was for our sons hedgehog, we ordered the biggest size and it works well. We haven't had any problems with tipping or squeakiness. We couldn't find the giant ones in our local stores so we are really happy to have found it here.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It works. It spins. It's not loud. But it wiggles so much that my girls don't seem to want to run on it for more than 10 seconds. Once they get into their stride it gets so bouncy that they jump off. (I don't worry about it falling over, seems sturdy in that respect- but I think I'm going to cave and buy a more expensive, sturdier wheel.)
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart quickly
customer_reviews.text: This wheel fell apart within a week of putting it in my ratties' cage. They chewed on the nub that holds the wheel on and off it fell. If you are designing a toy for rodents, you need to account for them being relentless chewers, so this toy was pretty much a total fail.
customer_reviews.author: XYZ

customer_reviews.title: Not silent only buy this wheel if you want to ...
customer_reviews.text: Not silent only buy this wheel if you want to wake up in the middle of the night 800 times try every single “silencer video diy” on youtube and question your existence as you painstakingly try to go about your 8 hour day on 3 hours of sleep.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca mckerron

customer_reviews.title: Not silent, breaks easily. Traps your pet.
customer_reviews.text: Not silent. Not durable. After several times of it coming apart, my chinchilla broke it after about 2 months of use. We got the jumbo version, but it still seems a bit small. Every week or so it would fall off the stand, often trapping the chinchilla underneath it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: It easily mounts to his cage as well
customer_reviews.text: It says silent in the name but it is much more silent than other wheels that are called silent. The only noise when our hedgehog uses it is the pitter patter of his feet. It easily mounts to his cage as well. All around a great wheel and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good for Female Rats
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Perfect for our female rats. Which they had one size larger, and/or an option to cage mount.
customer_reviews.author: AnthroPod

customer_reviews.title: Our rats love it!
customer_reviews.text: We mounted it to the side of our 2-story rat cage rather than use the stand. It is very large, so the side mount leaves lots of floor space and no worries about tipping - perfect for our girls. 2 of the 3 rats use it frequently. Plus, it doesn't make much noise at all when they run on it.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: OK buy
customer_reviews.text: Product is okay. The size is perfect for a Syrian hamster, but it is a bit squeaky and hard to spin. My hamster has a hard time running. I have to put oil on the connector to make it spin faster.
customer_reviews.author: Rio

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog loves this wheel! Very easy to clean. And it is HUGE, but it's great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bray

customer_reviews.title: Noise and function
customer_reviews.text: The 12 inch size was too big for our Syrian Hamster baby to move. It is wobbly and not as quiet as the smaller Kaytee Silent Spinner wheels. I bought the Silent Runner wheel instead and it was wonderful with a silent, smooth run.. Kaytee has since come out with a 10 inch Silent Runner which may be better for smaller Syrians.
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Good wheel!
customer_reviews.text: Really quiet. I’ve actually never seen my hedgehog use this yet because it never wakes me up when he is on it. I know he uses it though because of the mess he leaves behind!
customer_reviews.author: Didjits

customer_reviews.title: So we decided to upgrade in order to get better sleep. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: We have one but it's getting old and the screw for the spinner is starting to strip. So we decided to upgrade in order to get better sleep. Unfortunately, the first one we bought had the backing mounted incorrectly. We returned it. The next one had a huge gap between the wheel and the mounting bracket and was noiser than our old spinner. We returned it. Not sure if we want to try again....
customer_reviews.author: Jessy James

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla wasn’t too impressed with this. I don’t think he knows what to do in it. I had it in his cage for 2 weeks and I think he used it as a toilet. I may try it again soon.
customer_reviews.author: MKB

customer_reviews.title: Hedgie approved
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the wheels before for my hedgehog and just needed another. Love it perfect size for my chubby boy
customer_reviews.author: rori

customer_reviews.title: Very Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a replacement for an extremely noisy wheel I had for my chinchilla, and this has been much quieter! My only complaint is that it isn't very sturdy. I didn't want to attach it to the side of the cage, figuring that would rattle the whole cage, so I just set a heavy item on top of the bottom white part to hold it in place while my little guy runs super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Mathias

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter's dumbo rats. They seem to enjoy it. Pretty quiet compared to other wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Great wheel.
customer_reviews.text: Great for energetic average size hedgehog. Gives him lots of room. Very quiet. Does have more resistance than expected, but still works great. Prior wheel would spin a while freely if I gave it a push. This one doesn't keep spinning freely, but doesn't take significant effort by the hedgehog to get started or keep it going...for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: CTK

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty good quality wheels
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good quality wheels. They last quite a while as well. But they aren’t really silent. At least not for long. Even with adding oil to help things roll smoother, they eventually start making noise. But my rats have always enjoyed these wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Jonie Ricks

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Good for the first few months but it needed to be greased twice already and now whenever my chinchilla runs on it it's so loud I can hear it from outside.
customer_reviews.author: sports 485

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the for price
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty silent. But I t does end up falling over once a whole . Great for the price .
customer_reviews.author: Zonia orr

customer_reviews.title: Works great, is somewhat quieter than traditional metal wheels but ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, is somewhat quieter than traditional metal wheels but be mindful where you place it. My Degus were able to spin off the locking nut and chew away at the rubber sound dampener. Now when the wheel turns it's plastic on plastic and makes a terrible screeching sound. Would work well if you can keep that wheel on so they don't get to the rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Morales

customer_reviews.title: Hurt Hedgie
customer_reviews.text: My poor hedgie hurt his feet on this wheel! He was fine the first two nights he was using it, but as a previous review stated he probably hurt his feet on the crack between the two parts. My wheel may have also been defective because as I was touching the inside of it there were a few sharp bumps. I’d be cautious buying this for your hedgehog!
customer_reviews.author: Joc

customer_reviews.title: Giant wheel. Very stiff when spinning the wheel
customer_reviews.text: Looks sturdy. The packing was very good. Arrived very soon. The problem with the wheel I see is that doesn't spin smoothly is pretty stiff. I haven't seen him run in it yet. I will write another review about the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Hedgehog loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for my full grown hedgehog. She uses it every night. Given her nocturnal ways, it's important to note that this wheel really is relatively quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie DeStefano

customer_reviews.title: Not so silent
customer_reviews.text: It works as a wheel but it's incredibly loud compared to how I remember the silent spinners I've bought in the past
customer_reviews.author: dahowlers

customer_reviews.title: Critters love it, but poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: My chinchillas absolutely love this wheel. HOWEVER, it is not a quality wheel. When my chins use it, it bounces all over and begins to slump. When I came home from work one night, it had actually completely broken off of the cage wall. I’m not very happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna

customer_reviews.title: Great for Ratties
customer_reviews.text: My girl rats love this wheel. Is not to loud and is pretty easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: wunderpea

customer_reviews.title: Nice n quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my chinchilla and it’s nice n quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Funsized

customer_reviews.title: Not silent but not annoying
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for rats! They love it and use it frequently. Easy to take apart and clean and it's pretty quiet if not silent.
customer_reviews.author: lisalisa

customer_reviews.title: A bit too big
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it's fine for larger pets like sugar gliders, but my male Syrian doesn't quite get it. I'm ordering the 11" wodent wheel to see if he likes that better.
customer_reviews.author: Empolia

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: This wheel is pretty silent when left on the stand. But it bounces when a good spin gets going by my rats. This causes it to move so I had to tie the stand to the cage. Other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Gangas

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, not silent.
customer_reviews.text: It really is pretty quiet, I have a pet rat and he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor l.

customer_reviews.title: Great! Would reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, great build, great value but my giant Syrian hamster grew out of it
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, it’s huge and luxurious for a Syrian. Easy two piece assembly, doesn’t even require the instructions, it’s not rocket science.
customer_reviews.author: Kawah John Liang

customer_reviews.title: Wheel fell off
customer_reviews.text: The wheel fell on during the night when my rat was using it. Luckily she was not hurt and my daughter woke up so she could get the rat out from under the wheel. I bought this wheel on Amazon because it was so much less expensive than buying at a pet store. Maybe the reason is because it is defective I will try to return.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth K.

customer_reviews.title: Not a silent runner, but not as loud as a squeaky flying saucer
customer_reviews.text: Not so silent, but worth it You are able to attach to side of cage which I love. The stand it comes with is really unstable and fell as soon as they started runninf
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't think it spins as easily as it -should- but I have it hanging on ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it spins as easily as it -should- but I have it hanging on the side of the cage and my rats use it frequently enough. I don't think it's all that silent, either, but it's probably quieter than a metal wheel.
customer_reviews.author: James W

customer_reviews.title: Good wheel for the price
customer_reviews.text: Attaches to the side of my cage great. Little noisy but not too bad. I don't recommend using the metal stand. It isn't sturdy enough to stay standing when they get to running super fast. Good size. My girls love the 2 I put in their cage.
customer_reviews.author: Danyelle Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Very large wheel
customer_reviews.text: It is VERY LARGE and did not fit in the cage we had, but we upgraded the hamster cage. Would probably work for larger rodents as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sab. M.

product_meta.title: Kaytee Silent Spinner Exercise Wheel, Colors May Vary
product_meta.description: Size:Giant 12”Silent Spinners feature an enclosed spinner hub to reduce noise making them run quite compared to traditional exercise wheels. Silent Spinners work two ways: free standing or attach directly to any wire cage. Features a high-quality plastic running surface is safe and comfortable for your furry friend's feet. Available in sizes mini, regular or giant.
feature_bullets: Best for pet rats or chinchillas
Free standing or attach directly to any wire cage

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
